DOC.brief_title: Biomarker Study Elotuzumab High Risk Smoldering Myeloma
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com . Key Participants confirm diagnosis , accord criterion International Myeloma Working Group , smolder multiple myeloma , consider high risk accord follow : Serum monoclonal ( M ) protein ≥3 gm/dL bone marrow plasma cell ( BMPC ) ≥10 % Serum M protein 13 g/dL BMPC ≥10 % abnormal free light chain ratio < 0.125 > 8.0 Urine M protein > 200 mg/24 hour , ≥10 % BMPC , serum free light chain ratio ≤0.125 ≥8.0 Key Active multiple myeloma Monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance Active plasma cell leukemia Positive hepatitis B C virus HIV infection
